Class MCTSPlayer

java.lang.Object
AI.mcts.MCTSPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
AIAgent
public class MCTSPlayer extends Object implements AIAgent
An AI agent implementation based on Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS).

This player can be configured in two modes:

  • Basic MCTS: Uses standard UCT selection and random rollouts.
  • Optimized MCTS: Incorporates domain-specific heuristics (Centrality, Connectivity, Shortest Path) and move pruning to guide the search and improve performance.

  • Constructor Details

    • MCTSPlayer

      public MCTSPlayer(Player mctsPlayer, int iterations)
      Constructs a basic MCTS player without advanced heuristics or pruning. * @param mctsPlayer the player this agent controls
      Parameters:
      iterations - the number of simulations to run per move

    • MCTSPlayer

      public MCTSPlayer(Player mctsPlayer, int iterations, double threshold, double centralityWeight, double connectivityWeight, double biasScale, double spWeight, double cExploration)
      Constructs an optimized MCTS player with configurable heuristics and pruning. * @param mctsPlayer the player this agent controls
      Parameters:
      iterations - the number of simulations to run per move
      threshold - the pruning threshold (moves below max_score - threshold are discarded)
      centralityWeight - weight for the centrality heuristic
      connectivityWeight - weight for the connectivity heuristic
      biasScale - scaling factor for the heuristic bias in expansion
      spWeight - weight for the shortest path heuristic
      cExploration - the exploration constant (C) for UCT

  • Method Details

    • getBestMove

      public Move getBestMove(AIBoardAdapter boardAdapter, Player currentPlayer)
      Executes the MCTS search to determine the best move for the current position.

      Converts the abstract board adapter to a concrete Board, initializes the MCTS tree, runs the specified number of iterations, and returns the move corresponding to the most visited child of the root. * @param boardAdapter the current game board

      Specified by:
      getBestMove in interface AIAgent
      Parameters:
      boardAdapter - The current game board state (via AIBoardAdapter interface)
      currentPlayer - the player whose turn it is
      Returns:
      the calculated best Move, or a fallback legal move if search fails
